Gulp SVG Sprites (5 icons in <symbol> mode)

Files Generated:

  1. svg/symbols.svg

Usage:

  1. Include the contents of the SVG file just after the opening <body> tag.
  2. Paste one of the snippets anywhere into your website.

  • deezer


    <svg class="icon deezer"><use xlink:href="#deezer"></use></svg>

  • facebook


    <svg class="icon facebook"><use xlink:href="#facebook"></use></svg>

  • instagram


    <svg class="icon instagram"><use xlink:href="#instagram"></use></svg>

  • itunes


    <svg class="icon itunes"><use xlink:href="#itunes"></use></svg>

  • spotify


    <svg class="icon spotify"><use xlink:href="#spotify"></use></svg>
